rows.label: tlk000033_msg0001
rows.name: So this is your hometown, is it, boy?

rows.label: tlk000033_msg0002
rows.name:
It reminds me somewhat of the place
my brother and I spent our childhood.

rows.label: tlk000033_msg0003
rows.name:
But do not bother yourself with me.
Please, relax and enjoy yourself.
